title: Ego
data:
{{version030}} '''Egos''' are special abilities and [[intrinsic]]s found on [[weapons]], [[armour]], and other character items. When an item name shows as "+x foo of barring", the "of barring" is the ego. For example: boots ''of rampaging'', war axe ''of electrocution''. Egos on [[weapons]] are often referred to as [[brand]]s. This page focuses only on non-weapon egos; see the [[brand]] page for weapon egos. ==Egos== ===Armour egos=== {| class="wikitable sortable" !Name !Effect !Inscription !Found On |-style="vertical-align:top;" |[[Resistance (ego)|Resistance]] | Gain 1 rank in [[fire resistance]] and [[cold resistance]]. | {rF+ rC+} | Body armour (only [[robe]]s), [[shields]], [[scarves]] |-style="vertical-align:top;" |[[Fire resistance|Fire Resistance]] | Gain 1 rank of [[fire resistance]]. | {rF+} | All [[body armour]], [[barding]], [[shields]]
Cloaks found in [[Volcano]] |-style="vertical-align:top;" |[[Cold Resistance]] | Gain 1 rank of [[cold resistance]]. | {rC+} | All [[body armour]], [[barding]], [[shields]]
Cloaks found in an [[Ice cave]] |-style="vertical-align:top;" |[[Poison Resistance]] | Gain [[poison resistance]]. | {rPois} | All [[body armour]] (other than [[robe]]s), [[cloak]]s, [[shields]] |-style="vertical-align:top;" |[[Life Protection|Positive Energy]] | Gain 1 level of [[life protection]]. | {rN+} | All [[body armour]], [[shields]] |-style="vertical-align:top;" |[[Preservation]] | Gain [[corrosion resistance]] | {rCorr} | [[Cloak]]s |-style="vertical-align:top;" |[[Protection]] | Shield: gain +3 AC.
Weapon: temporarily gain +7 [[AC]] after striking an enemy. | {Protect} or {AC+3} | [[Shields]], [[weapons]] |-style="vertical-align:top;" |[[Willpower]] | Gain +40 [[willpower]]. | {Will+} | All [[body armour]], [[cloak]]s, [[hat]]s |-style="vertical-align:top;" |[[Strength]] | Gain +3 [[strength]]. | {Str+3} | [[Gloves]] |-style="vertical-align:top;" |[[Dexterity]] | Gain +3 [[dexterity]]. | {Dex+3} | [[Gloves]] |-style="vertical-align:top;" |[[Intelligence]] | Gain +3 [[intelligence]]. | {Int+3} | [[Hat]]s, [[helmet]]s |-style="vertical-align:top;" |[[Rampaging]] | Adds an additional tile of movement when moving directly towards an enemy. | {rampage} | [[Boots]], [[barding]] |-style="vertical-align:top;" |[[Flight (ego)|Flight]] | Can be [[evoke]]d for indefinite [[fly|flight]]. | {+Fly} | [[Boots]], [[barding]] |-style="vertical-align:top;" |[[Stealth]] | Gain +50 [[stealth]]. | {Stlth+} | [[Boots]], [[barding]], [[cloak]]s |-style="vertical-align:top;" |[[See Invisible]] | Gain [[see invisible]]. | {SInv} | [[Hat]]s, [[helmet]]s |-style="vertical-align:top;" |[[Archmagi (ego)|Archmagi]] | Boosts [[spell power]] for all spells. | {Archmagi} | Body armour (only [[robe]]s) |-style="vertical-align:top;" |[[Ponderousness]] | Increases [[Movement#Character_Speed|movement delay]] by 0.1 (10% slower for most species). | {ponderous} | Body armour (only [[chain mail]], [[plate armour]]) |-style="vertical-align:top;" |[[Reflection]] | [[Reflection|Reflects]] any [[Shields#Blocking|blocked]] physical or magical ranged attacks back at the attacker. | {reflect} | [[Shields]] |-style="vertical-align:top;" |[[Hurling]] | +4 [[slaying]] to [[Throwing]] weapons. | {hurl} | [[Gloves]] |} [[Animal skin]]s and [[crystal plate armour]] won't generate with egos outside of certain [[vault]]s. [[Dragon scales]] can never generate with egos (though they can have rF+, rC+, etc. as [[artefact]] properties). ===Scarf egos=== [[Scarves]] have a unique list of egos, some only found on scarves. {| class="wikitable sortable" !Name !Effect !Inscription |-style="vertical-align:top;" |[[Harm]] | Increases damage dealt and taken. | {Harm} |-style="vertical-align:top;" |[[Invisibility (ego)|Invisibility]] | Can be [[evoke]]d for [[invisibility]], but each attempt [[drain]]s the wearer. | {+Inv} |-style="vertical-align:top;" |[[Repulsion]] | Lowers [[to-hit]] of ranged attacks. | {repulsion} |-style="vertical-align:top;" |[[Resistance (ego)|Resistance]] | Gain 1 rank in [[fire resistance]] and [[cold resistance]]. | {rF+ rC+} |-style="vertical-align:top;" |[[Shadows]] | Reduces [[LOS]] range by 1 tile. | {shadows} |} ===Orb egos=== [[Orb]]s also have a unique list of egos, these can only be found on orbs. {| class="wikitable sortable" !Name !Effect !Inscription |-style="vertical-align:top;" |[[Energy]] | On successful [[spell]] cast, 20% to refund MP. On spell miscast, 100% to refund MP. Increases spell failure rate. | {energy} |-style="vertical-align:top;" |[[Guile]] | Reduces [[willpower]] of you and enemies by 80 (Will--). | {guile} |-style="vertical-align:top;" |[[Light]] | Gives you a 3-tile [[halo]], revealing invisible enemies, increasing [[to-hit]] against anyone but you, decreasing your [[stealth]]. | {light} |-style="vertical-align:top;" |[[Mayhem]] | On kill, 50% chance to send another enemy into [[frenzy]]. | {mayhem} |-style="vertical-align:top;" |[[Wrath]] | On melee hit, 20% chance to inflict [[berserk]] on yourself. | {*Rage} |} ==History== *Prior to [[0.28]], [[archery]] was an ego instead of [[hurling]]; also 5 new [[orb]] egos were added. *Prior to [[0.27]], hats and gloves could not get the stealth ego. Running could be found on boots and bardings. *[[0.26]] added the rampaging and shadows egos, caused the invisibility ego to [[drain]] the user, and renamed magic resistance to willpower. *Prior to [[0.25]], [[spirit shield]] could be found as an ego on scarves. *Prior to [[0.15]], the archery ego penalised melee (-1,-1) and gave more accuracy than damage (+5,+3). *The [[preservation]] ego was removed in [[0.15]], and returned in [[0.25]]. *The [[jumping]] ego was added for boots in [[0.14]] and removed in [[0.16]].
